org.asoem.greyfish.impl.io

Class GreyfishH2ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.asoem.greyfish.impl.io.GreyfishH2ConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Supplier<java.sql.Connection>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, ConnectionManager

    public final class GreyfishH2ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionManager, java.io.Closeable
    This ConnectionManager implementation manages a single connection to a H2 database.
